Booking settings

This is how much advance notice you need to prepare for the start of your experience. if you need more time to prepare, we recommend a longer cutoff time, if you don't need much time you can go shorter

Cutoff Time for Additional Guests:

This is the latest point at which guests can add themselves to an already-booked experience. Choose how far in advance they must book.

Choose Cutoff Time for First Guest:

If no one books by this time, your experience will no longer be available for that session. Choose how much time in advance guests need to make their first booking.
